column11: Disposable prayer beads. Will repel Puppets for up to 100 steps.

Cannot be used as currency in the outside world. Sells cheaply.

What it's actually used for is unclear. Sells for a respectable price. Handle with care.
It is unknown who wrote this. Sells for a respectable price.

Cannot be used as currency in the outside world. Sells at a high price.

Can not be used as currency. Sells at a very high price.

Pieces of crystallized magic. These might be useful if I hold onto them.

column11: A hard rice cracker baked in bamboo charcoal. Heals 20 HP.

Popular steamed bun souvenir. Heals 100 HP.
Moderately sweet bean jelly. Heals 200 HP.
A jam with a generous helping of fruit. Fully heals HP.
Assortment of peaches from Heaven. Fully restores a Puppet's HP and removes status effects.
Sacred sake used for spiritual rites at the Moriya Shrine. Restores a fainted Puppet to half HP.
Sacred sake used for spiritual rites at the Hakurei Shrine. Restores a fainted Puppet to full HP.
Tea brewed by a nun of Myouren Temple. Granting one a relaxed sensation it recovers status ailments.
Recovers 10 SP to one Skill of an individual Puppet. Unimplimented.
Restores full SP to one skill of an individual Puppet. Unimplimented.
Recovers 10 SP to all Skills of an individual Puppet. Unimplimented.
Restores full SP to all skills of an individual Puppet. Unimplimented.
Candy in the seven colors of the rainbow. Raises an individual Puppet's level by 1.
Light and transparent mochi. Resets PP in all stats.
